settings.description: API keys required by nodes in this library

metadata.author: Griptape
metadata.description: Collection of nodes for Topaz Labs image and video enhancement and processing operations.

image/topazlabs.title: Image/Topaz Labs
image/topazlabs.description: Image enhancement and processing nodes using Topaz Labs API

video/topazlabs.title: Video/Topaz Labs
video/topazlabs.description: Video enhancement and processing nodes using Topaz Labs API

metadata.description: Reduces image noise using Topaz Labs Denoise API with adjustable strength and detail preservation.
Enhances image sharpness, clarity, and facial details using Topaz Labs Enhance API.
Creative image enhancement using generative AI models with prompt-based control and artistic effects.
Frame interpolation and smooth motion enhancement for converting videos to 60fps and creating slow motion effects.
Video upscaling and quality enhancement with AI-powered resolution improvement and detail recovery.
Video denoising and compression artifact removal with temporal consistency and detail preservation.
